html.head:
<link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+KR:wght@100..900&family=Noto+Sans+Mono:wght@100..900&display=swap' rel='stylesheet'>
    
    
    
    
      
      
      
    
  	
  	
    

    
    

    
        /*
        -----------------------------------------------
        Blogger Template Style
        Name:     OP
        Designer: Victor Chanil Park
        License:  MIT
        URL:      https://github.com/opdev1004/op-blogger-themes
        -----------------------------------------------
        */
        /*
        <Group description="Body">
            <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body Background Color" type="color" default="#424242"  value="#424242"/>
			<Variable name="body.font.color" description="Body Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
			<Variable name="body.hover.font.color" description="Body Hover Font Color" type="color" default="#BDBDBD" value="#BDBDBD"/>
			<Variable name="body.active.font.color" description="Body Active Font Color" type="color" default="#999999" value="#999999"/>
        </Group>
        <Group description="Header">
            <Variable name="header.background.color" description="Header Background Color" type="color" default="#222222"  value="#222222"/>
            <Variable name="header.font.color" description="Header Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
			<Variable name="header.hover.font.color" description="Header Hover Font Color" type="color" default="#cccccc" value="#cccccc"/>
			<Variable name="header.active.font.color" description="Header Active Font Color" type="color" default="#999999" value="#999999"/>
        </Group>
		<Group description="Sidebar">
            <Variable name="sidebar.background.color" description="Sidebar Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff"  value="#ffffff"/>
            <Variable name="sidebar.font.color" description="Sidebar Font Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/>
			<Variable name="sidebar.hover.font.color" description="Sidebar Hover Font Color" type="color" default="#666666"  value="#666666"/>
			<Variable name="sidebar.active.font.color" description="Sidebar Active Font Color" type="color" default="#999999"  value="#999999"/>
			<Variable name="sidebar.right.background.color" description="Sidebar Mobile Right Background Color" type="color" default="#000000"  value="#000000"/>
        </Group>
        <Group description="Search">
            <Variable name="search.input.font.color" description="Search Input Font Color" type="color" default="#000000"  value="#000000"/>
			<Variable name="search.input.background.color" description="Search Input Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff"  value="#ffffff"/>
      		<Variable name="search.input.focus.background.color" description="Search Input focus Background Color" type="color" default="#eeeeee"  value="#eeeeee"/>
			<Variable name="search.input.border.color" description="Search Input Border Color" type="color" default="#999999"  value="#999999"/>
      		<Variable name="search.button.font.color" description="Search Button Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#000000"/>
			<Variable name="search.button.background.color" description="Search Button Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
			<Variable name="search.button.hover.background.color" description="Search Button Hover Background Color" type="color" default="#eeeeee" value="#eeeeee"/>
			<Variable name="search.button.active.background.color" description="Search Button Active Background Color" type="color" default="#cccccc" value="#cccccc"/>
        </Group>
        <Group description="Main">
      		<Variable name="main.font.color" description="Main Font Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/>
			<Variable name="main.hover.font.color" description="Main Hover Font Color" type="color" default="#666666"  value="#666666"/>
			<Variable name="main.active.font.color" description="Main Active Font Color" type="color" default="#999999"  value="#999999"/>
			<Variable name="main.background.color" description="Main Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff"  value="#ffffff"/>
			<Variable name="main.button.font.color" description="Main Button Font/Icon/SVG Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
			<Variable name="main.button.background.color" description="Main Button Background Color" type="color" default="#546E7A" value="#546E7A"/>
			<Variable name="main.button.hover.background.color" description="Main Button Hover Background Color" type="color" default="#455A64" value="#455A64"/>
			<Variable name="main.button.active.background.color" description="Main Button Active Background Color" type="color" default="#37474F" value="#37474F"/>
			<Variable name="main.blogger.logo.color" description="Main Blogger Logo Color" type="color" default="#666666" value="#666666"/>
			<Variable name="main.horizontal.ruler.color" description="Main Horizontal Ruler Color" type="color" default="#999999" value="#999999"/>
        </Group>
        <Group description="Footer">
            <Variable name="footer.background.color" description="Footer Background Color" type="color" default="#222222"  value="#222222"/>
      		<Variable name="footer.font.color" description="Footer Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
			<Variable name="footer.hover.font.color" description="Footer Hover Font Color" type="color" default="#cccccc"  value="#cccccc"/>
			<Variable name="footer.active.font.color" description="Footer Active Font Color" type="color" default="#999999"  value="#999999"/>
			<Variable name="footer.horizontal.ruler.color" description="Footer Horizontal Ruler Color" type="color" default="#999999" value="#999999"/>
        </Group>
        <Group description="Comment">
			<Variable name="comment.profile.background.color" description="Comment Profile Background Color" type="color" default="#546E7A"  value="#546E7A"/>
			<Variable name="comment.profile.hover.background.color" description="Comment Profile Hover Background Color" type="color" default="#455A64"  value="#455A64"/>
			<Variable name="comment.profile.active.background.color" description="Comment Profile Active Background Color" type="color" default="#37474F"  value="#37474F"/>
			<Variable name="comment.profile.font.color" description="Comment Name Font Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
        </Group>
        <Group description="Code">
            <Variable name="code.background.color" description="Code Background Color" type="color" default="#212121"  value="#212121"/>
            <Variable name="code.font.color" description="Code Font Color" type="color" default="#EEFFFF" value="#EEFFFF"/>
			<Variable name="code.border.color" description="Code border Color" type="color" default="#CCCCCC" value="#CCCCCC"/>
        </Group>
        */

        img,
		svg {
          border-style: none;
          max-width: 100%;
          max-height: 100%;
          width: auto;
          height: auto;
        }

		pre {
			background-color: $(code.background.color) !important;
			color: $(code.font.color) !important;
			border: 1px solid $(code.border.color);
            overflow: auto;
            white-space: pre-wrap;
            word-wrap: break-word;
			padding: 20px;
            word-break: normal;
		}
		code {
			font-family: "Noto Sans Mono", "Monaco", "Consolas", "Courier New", "DejaVu Sans Mono", monospace !important;
			color: $(code.font.color) !important;
			background-color: $(code.background.color) !important;
		}
		code p {
			margin-bottom: 0px !important;
		}

		body {
			font-family: "Noto Sans Mono", "Noto Sans KR", 'Malgun Gothic', sans-serif, "Monaco", "Consolas", "Courier New", "DejaVu Sans Mono", monospace !important;
			background-color: $(body.background.color);
			color: $(body.font.color);
			margin: 0px;
			padding: 0px;
  			word-break: normal;
			overflow-wrap: break-word;
			overflow-x: hidden;
		}

		a {
			color: $(body.font.color);
			text-decoration: none;
			transition: color 0.3s ease;
		}
		
		a:hover {
			color: $(body.hover.font.color);
		}

		a:active {
			color: $(body.active.font.color);
		}

		header {
			position: fixed;
        	width: 100%;
			min-height: 64px;
        	background-color: $(header.background.color);
			color: $(header.font.color);
			user-select: none;
			overflow: hidden;
			z-index: 2147483646;
        }

 		header a {
			color: $(header.font.color);
			transition: color 0.3s ease;
		}

		header a:hover {
			color: $(header.hover.font.color);
		}

 		header a:active {
			color: $(header.active.font.color);
		}

		#header-wrapper {
			margin-left: auto;
			margin-right: auto;
			max-width:1280px;
			padding: 0px;
			align-items: center;
			display: flex;
		}

		#header-menu-button {
			color: $(header.font.color);
			cursor: pointer;
			height: 64px;
			width: 64px;
			align-items: center;
			justify-content: center; 
			display: none;
			flex-shrink: 0;
			flex-grow: 0;
			transition: color 0.3s ease;
		}

		#header-menu-button:hover {
			color: $(header.hover.font.color);
		}

		#header-menu-button:active {
			color: $(header.active.font.color);
		}

		#header-title {
			font-size: 1.5em;
			font-weight: bold;
			height: 64px;
			display: inline-block;
			margin: 0px 8px;
			display: flex;
			align-items: center;
			white-space: nowrap;
            text-overflow: ellipsis; 
			overflow: hidden;
		}

		#header-login-button {
			color: $(header.font.color);
			cursor: pointer;
			height: 64px;
			width: 64px;
			align-items: center;
			justify-content: center; 
			display: flex;
			flex-shrink: 0;
			flex-grow: 0;
			transition: color 0.3s ease;
			margin-left: auto;
		}

		#header-login-button:hover {
			color: $(header.hover.font.color);
		}

		#header-login-button:active {
			color: $(header.active.font.color);
		}

		.space-64 {
			height: 64px;
			padding: 0px;
			margin: 0px;
			overflow: hidden;
		}

		.section,
		.widget {
			margin: 24px 0px;
		}
		
		#BlogSearch1 {
			margin: 10px 0px;
		}

		#BlogSearch1 form{
			display: flex;
		}

		.search-input {
			display: inline-block;
			flex-grow: 1;
		}

        .search-input input {
		  width: calc(100% - 32px);
          font-size: 1em;
          border-color: $(search.input.border.color);
          border-style: solid;
          border-width: 2px;
          border-radius: 4px;
          outline: none;
          padding: 0.8em 0.8em;
          background-color: $(search.input.background.color);
		  color: $(search.input.font.color);
          transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
        }

        .search-input input:focus {
          background-color: $(search.input.focus.background.color);
        }

		.search-action {
		  margin-left: 4px;
          border-style: none;
          border-radius: 100%;
          font-weight: bold;
          font-size: 1.4em;
		  line-height: 0.5em;
          padding: 0.8em 0.6em;
          text-align: center;
          color: $(search.button.font.color);
          background-color: $(search.button.background.color);
          transition: background-color 0.3s ease
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          display: flex;
		}
		
        .search-action:hover {
          background-color: $(search.button.hover.background.color);
        }

        .search-action:active {
          background-color: $(search.button.active.background.color);
        }

        .search-label::before {
          content: '"';
        }

        .search-label::after {
          content: '"';
        }

		#Page-Wrapper {
			display: flex;
			justify-content: center;
			width: 100%;
			overflow-x: hidden;
		}


		#Main-Content-Wrapper {
			width: 100%;
        	max-width: 700px;
			margin: 8px;
		}

		
		main {
			margin: 10px 0px;
			padding: 20px 16px;
			background-color: $(main.background.color);
			color: $(main.font.color);
			border-radius: 4px;
		}

       main iframe {
          width: 100%;
          height: calc((100vw - 48px) / 16 * 9);
          max-width: 668px;
          max-height: 376px;
       }

		main a {
			color: $(main.font.color);
		}
		
		main a:hover {
			color: $(main.hover.font.color);
		}

		main a:active {
			color: $(main.active.font.color);
		}

		main h1 {
			font-size: 2em;
			margin-top: 0px;
		}

		main h2 {
			font-size: 1.8em;
		}

		main h3 {
			font-size: 1.6em;
		}

		main h4 {
			font-size: 1.4em;
		}

		main h5 {
			font-size: 1.2em;
		}

		main h6 {
			font-size: 1em;
		}

		main .post-body {
			padding: 8px 0px;
		}

		#sidebar {
			margin: 18px 10px 10px 10px;
			width: 100%;
			max-width: 236px;
			z-index: 2147483643;
		}

		#sidebar-left {
			background-color: $(sidebar.background.color);
			color: $(sidebar.font.color);
			width: 100%;
			max-width: 220px;
			padding: 8px;
			border-radius: 4px;
			z-index: 2147483645;
		}

 		#sidebar-left a {
			color: $(sidebar.font.color);
			transition: color 0.3s ease;
		}

 		#sidebar-left a:hover{
			color: $(sidebar.hover.font.color);
		}

 		#sidebar-left a:active{
			color: $(sidebar.active.font.color);
		}

		#sidebar-left ul,
 		#sidebar-left ol {
			margin: 0px;
			padding: 0px 0px 0px 20px;
		}

		#blog-pager {
          display: flex;
          justify-content: space-between;
          align-items: center;
		  margin: 16px 0px;
        }

        .blog-pager-newer-link {
          margin-left: 0;
        }

        .blog-pager-older-link {
          margin-right: 0;
        }

		.page-nav-button {
		  display: flex;
		  align-items: center;
          border-style: none;
          border-radius: 2147483647px;
          font-weight: bold;
          font-size: 1em;
          padding: 0.8em 1.4em;
          text-align: center;
          color: $(main.button.font.color);
          background-color: $(main.button.background.color);
          transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
		  user-select: none;
		}

        .page-nav-button:hover {
		  color: $(main.button.font.color);
          background-color: $(main.button.hover.background.color);
        }

        .page-nav-button:active {
		  color: $(main.button.font.color);
          background-color: $(main.button.active.background.color);
        }


		.post-list-item-wrapper {
			display: flex;
			max-width: 100%;
			margin: 8px 0px;
		}

		.post-index-image {
			flex-shrink: 0;
			width: 150px;
			max-width: 150px;
			height: auto;"
		}
		
		.post-index-image svg {
			width: 100%;
			height: auto;
			fill: $(main.blogger.logo.color);
		}

		.post-index-text {
			flex-grow: 1;
			margin-left: 8px;
		}

		.post-index-text h4 {
			margin-top: 0px;
		}

		.post-item-divider {
            border: none;
            height: 1px;
            background-color: $(main.horizontal.ruler.color);
		}

		.post-footer svg,
		.post-header svg {
			width: 24px;
			height: 24px;
			fill: $(main.button.font.color);
		}

		.share-buttons {
			width: 100%;
			list-style-type: none;
			padding: 0;
			margin: 0;
			display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
			flex-wrap: wrap;
		}

		.share-buttons li {
            border-style: none;
            border-radius: 100%;
            padding: 0.6em 0.6em;
            line-height: 0.5em;
            text-align: center;
			transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
			margin: 0px 4px;
			display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
			background-color: $(main.button.background.color);
			flex-basis: auto;
		}

		.share-buttons li:hover {
          background-color: $(main.button.hover.background.color);
        }

        .share-buttons li:active {
          background-color: $(main.button.active.background.color);
        }

        .comments {
            margin-top: 30px;
        }

        .comments .title {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .comments ol {
            list-style-type: none;
        }

        .comments #top-ra {
            padding: 0;
        }

        .comments #top-ra > li {
            margin: 10px auto;
        }

        .comments .comment {
            margin-top: 20px;  
        }

        .comments .comment .avatar-image-container {
            background-color: $(comment.profile.background.color);
            width: 35px;
            height: 35px;
            display: inline-block;
            vertical-align: top;
            border-radius: 100%;
        }

        .comments .comment .avatar-image-container::before {
			color: $(comment.profile.font.color);
            content: '?';
            line-height: 35px;
            position: absolute;
            height: 35px;
            width: 35px;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .comments .comment .avatar-image-container img {
            border-radius: 100%;
            position: absolute;
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block {
            width: calc(100% - 70px);
            display: inline-block;
            margin: 0 8px 8px 8px;  
            padding: 4px 8px 8px 8px;
			border-radius: 25px;
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block .comment-header {}

        .comments .comment .comment-block .comment-header cite {
            color: $(comment.profile.font.color);
            font-style: normal;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding: 5px 10px;
            border-radius: 25px;
            background-color: $(comment.profile.background.color);
			cursor: pointer;
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block .comment-header cite:hover {
            background-color: $(comment.profile.hover.background.color)
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block .comment-header cite:active {
            background-color: $(comment.profile.active.background.color)
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block .comment-header cite a {
            color: $(comment.profile.font.color);
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block .comment-header .datetime {
            font-size: 0.8em;
            display: block;
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-block p {
            margin: 5px 0;
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-actions {
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            display: inline-block;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 0.8em;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            cursor: pointer;
            user-select: none;
            white-space: nowrap;
            overflow: hidden;
            text-overflow: ellipsis;
        }

        .comments .comment .comment-actions .comment-reply {
            margin-right: 8px;
        }

        .comments .comment .thread-toggle,
        .comments .comment .continue,
        .comments .comment-form #comment-post-message,
        .comments .loadmore {
            display: none;
        }

        .comments #comment-editor {
        }

        .comments .blogger-comment-from-post {
            margin: 20px auto;
        }


        footer {
		  min-height: 100vh;
          background-color: $(footer.background.color);
          color: $(footer.font.color);
          padding: 16px 8px;
		  margin-top: 48px
        }

        footer a {
          color: $(footer.font.color);
          text-decoration: none;
          transition: color 0.3s ease;
        }

        footer a:hover {
          color: $(footer.hover.font.color);
        }

        footer a:active {
          color: $(footer.active.font.color);
        }

        .footer-line {
          border-top: 1px solid $(footer.horizontal.ruler.color);
          margin: 20px 0;
        }

        .Footer-Head .widget-content ul {
          list-style: none;
          padding: 0;
          margin: 0;
          display: flex;
          justify-content: center;
		  flex-wrap: wrap;
        }

        .Footer-Head .widget-content li {
          margin: 0 10px;
          font-size: 16px;
		  flex-basis: auto;
        }

        #footer-info {
		  text-align: center;
          margin-top: 10px;
          font-size: 14px;
        }

        @media all and (min-width: 0px) and (max-width: 1280px) {

        	#header-menu-button {
            	display: flex;
        	}
	
			#Page-Wrapper
			{
				display: block;
			}

			.pagination-text {
				display: none;
			}

			#sidebar {
				max-width: 100%;
				width: 100%;
				height: calc(100% - 20px);
				display: none;
				position: fixed;
				margin: 0px;
			}

			#sidebar-left {
				position: relative;
				left: 0px;
				top: 0px;
				height: 100%;
				overflow-y: scroll;
				border-radius: 0px;
			}

			#sidebar-right {
				top: 0px;
				left: 0px;
				position: fixed;
				height: 100%;
				width: 100%;
				background-color: $(sidebar.right.background.color);
				opacity: 0.7;
				z-index: 2147483644;
			}

			#Main-Content-Wrapper {
				width: calc(100% - 8px);
				margin: 8px auto;
			}
        }

        .elevation {
          box-shadow: 0 2px 1px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 1px 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14),
            0 1px 3px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-1 {
          box-shadow: 0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14),
            0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-2 {
          box-shadow: 0 3px 3px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 3px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14),
            0 1px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-3 {
          box-shadow: 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 4px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14),
            0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-4 {
          box-shadow: 0 3px 5px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 5px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14),
            0 1px 14px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-5 {
          box-shadow: 0 3px 5px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 6px 10px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 1px 18px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-6 {
          box-shadow: 0 4px 5px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 7px 10px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 2px 16px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-7 {
          box-shadow: 0 5px 5px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 8px 10px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 3px 14px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-8 {
          box-shadow: 0 5px 6px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 9px 12px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 3px 16px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-9 {
          box-shadow: 0 6px 6px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 10px 14px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 4px 18px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-10 {
          box-shadow: 0 6px 7px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 11px 15px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 4px 20px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-11 {
          box-shadow: 0 7px 8px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 12px 17px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 5px 22px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-12 {
          box-shadow: 0 7px 8px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 13px 19px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 5px 24px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-13 {
          box-shadow: 0 7px 9px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 14px 21px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 5px 26px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-14 {
          box-shadow: 0 8px 9px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 15px 22px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 28px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-15 {
          box-shadow: 0 8px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 16px 24px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 30px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-16 {
          box-shadow: 0 8px 11px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 17px 26px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 6px 32px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-17 {
          box-shadow: 0 9px 11px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 18px 28px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 7px 34px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-18 {
          box-shadow: 0 9px 12px -6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 19px 29px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 7px 36px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-19 {
          box-shadow: 0 10px 13px -6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 20px 31px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 8px 38px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-20 {
          box-shadow: 0 10px 13px -6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 21px 33px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 8px 40px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-21 {
          box-shadow: 0 10px 14px -6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 22px 35px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 8px 42px 7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }
        .elevation-22 {
          box-shadow: 0 11px 14px -7px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2),
            0 23px 36px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14), 0 9px 44px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12);
        }


    


    Style for layout page
    
		body#layout
		{
			padding: 80px 0px 0px 0px !important;
			width: 800px !important;
		}

		body#layout .Page-Wrapper
        {
			display: block !important;
			margin: 0px !important;
        }

		body#layout .Main-Content-Wrapper
        {
			display: block !important;
			margin: 0px !important;
        }

		body#layout header,
		body#layout main,
		body#layout aside,
		body#layout #sidebar,
		body#layout #sidebar-left,
		body#layout #Main-Content-Wrapper,
		body#layout #Content-Top,
		body#layout #Content,
		body#layout #Content-Bottom,
		body#layout footer
		{
			max-width: 780px !important;
			width: 780px !important;
			height: auto !important;
			min-height: 0px !important;
            margin: 5px auto !important;
			padding: 0px !important;
			display: block !important;
		}

		body#layout .section,
		body#layout .section .widget
		{
			width: 100% !important;
			height: auto !important;
			min-height: 0px !important;
            margin: 5px auto !important;
			padding: 0px !important;
			display: block !important;
		}

    


    
    
    //
		const langData = {
			search: "Search",
			noResult: "Cannot find any result",
		} 

		function FixSidebar(){
			const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
			const MBStyle = window.getComputedStyle(document.getElementById('header-menu-button'));
			if(sidebar.style.display != 'block' && MBStyle.display == 'none'){
				sidebar.style.display = 'block';
			}
		}

        function menu(){
			const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
			const SBStyle = window.getComputedStyle(sidebar);
			if(SBStyle.display == 'none'){
				sidebar.style.display = 'block';
        	}
        	else{
				sidebar.style.display = 'none';
        	}
       	}

		function toClipboard(str) {
			let el = document.createElement('textarea');
            el.setAttribute('readonly', '');
            el.style = {position: 'absolute', left: '-9999px'};
			el.value = str;
			document.body.appendChild(el);
			el.select();
			document.execCommand('copy');
			document.body.removeChild(el);
		}

		function $_GET(param) {
			var vars = {};
			window.location.href.replace( location.hash, '' ).replace(
				/[?&]+([^=&]+)=?([^&]*)?/gi, // regexp
				function( m, key, value ) { // callback
					vars[key] = value !== undefined ? value : '';
				}
			);

   			if ( param ) {
				return vars[param] ? vars[param] : null;
			}
			return vars;
		}

        function checkClass(x){
             const theClass = document.getElementsByClassName(x);
             if (theClass.length > 0) {
                 return true;
             }
             else{
                 return false;
             }
        }

        function checkID(x){
        	const theID = document.getElementById(x);
        	if (theID === null) {
        		return false;
        	}
            else{
         		return true;
       		}
        }

        function checkTag(x){
        	const theTag = document.getElementsByTagName(x);
        	if (theTag.length > 0) {
        		return true;
        	}
            else{
        		return false;
       		}
        }

    //

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
The design of the OP Blogger Theme prioritizes human-centered readability with a modern, responsive layout. Our goal is to provide a seamless experience across all devices, ensuring your content looks stunning everywhere.

With over a decade of experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I’ve poured my knowledge and passion into this theme to create the most refined, user-friendly design available.

OP Blogger Theme stands as the pinnacle of my work—combining aesthetics, functionality, and performance to deliver the best blogging experience.

b:includable.b:comment: Some features are blocked on purpose for consistent design and functioning

b:with.value: navigator.clipboard.writeText(data.originalUrl).then(function() { alert("Copied to clipboard: " + data.originalUrl); }).catch(function(err) { console.error("Could not copy text: ", err); });

b:eval.expr: snippet(data:post.body, { length: 200, links: false, linebreaks: false })

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons
